name: Quest ontheFRONTIER
description: Founded in 2002 in Singapore, Quest ontheFRONTIER is an exclusive consultancy focused on Executive & Leadership Search, Corporate Training, and Business Conferences. Being ex-Bankers, we thoroughly focus on financial services executive search and cater services exclusively to Middle East and Asia. We are determined to match outstanding American and European candidates for our clients through our rigorous screening process. Over the past few years, we have built a large and growing database of promising women candidates and attribute our ability of hiring Independent Directors with a particular focus on Women Directors and ESG. Our Consultants and Trainers are experienced professionals with relevant industry and functional experiences gained at leading global firms. We systematically harness the experiences, skills, insights, and networks of recently retired senior executives for suitable client engagements. Quest Conferences, a unit of Quest ontheFRONTIER specializes in creating business-to-business platforms such as conferences & summits on subjects of topical interests. These conferences help us engage senior industry executives, regulators, and government officials, enabling technology and services providers who can connect, network, and exchange ideas and best practices.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently

enhanced_description: Quest ontheFRONTIER, established in Singapore in 2002, is an exclusive HR consultancy specializing in Executive & Leadership Search, Corporate Training & Development, and Business Conferences. They primarily serve clients in the Middle East and Asia, with a deep-seated expertise in financial services executive search, stemming from their founders' ex-banker backgrounds. The consultancy prides itself on a rigorous screening process to match outstanding American and European candidates with client needs. Quest ontheFRONTIER has a strong focus on diversity, having built a significant database of promising women candidates and specializing in hiring Independent Directors, particularly Women Directors with an emphasis on ESG considerations. Their team consists of experienced professionals and strategically leverages the insights and networks of recently retired senior executives. Through their core services and business conferences, Quest ontheFRONTIER aims to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and help organizations acquire top talent faster and more efficiently.
